A torch sheds [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407) in a 20-foot radius (and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) to the next 20 feet) for 1 hour. It can be used as an improvised weapon that deals 1d4 bludgeoning damage plus 1 fire damage.
